visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include two series named 'Series 1' and 'Series 2' with the provided data. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is light gray. The title and axes labels are styled with specific colors and font sizes. The x-axis categories represent months, and the y-axis title indicates temperature in degrees Celsius. The tooltip has a border width of 2 pixels. The legend items are also styled with a specific color and font size. The data series include two sets of monthly temperature data, named 'Series 1' and 'Series 2', each with custom colors for better differentiation.
